S06pplg202u:184_1: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām

S06pplg202u:194_0: 4 cet punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06pplg202u:194_1: bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyamānasyopāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg202u:196: atha ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā /
S06pplg202u:197: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs
S06pplg202u:198: 6 tāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati tathā ca pariṇamayati /
S06pplg202u:199: yathā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg202u:200: 7 dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati /
S06pplg202u:202: 8 samyaksaṃbodhiḥ āha kathaṃ bhagavaṃn anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06pplg202u:204: yā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06pplg202u:209: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sā naiva vardhate na parihīyate tat subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pplg202u:210: 10 prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhīkṣṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati na kasya cid dharmasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg202u:211: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilāpyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na
S06pplg202u:213: evaṃ khalu subhūte dānapāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā prajñāpāramitāyā naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ / evaṃ
S06pplg202u:214: 12 yāvat pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ /
S06pplg202u:215: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ /
